content.question: If one were interested in showing how much certain industries spend on lobbying, the best way to change the visual would be to

choices.label: exclude the Chamber of Commerce from the data and draw a pie chart
categorize the data by industry group and combine the data so that a bar represents each group
change to a line graph with the x-axis (horizontal) displaying industry group and the y-axis (vertical) showing total money spent on lobbying
create a table showing the money spent by the Chamber of Commerce for each year from 1998 through 2014

content.answer: categorize the data by industry group and combine the data so that a bar represents each group

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain possible limitations of the visual representation of the data provided
